entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 a.m. ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 6:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa steady
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm except 20 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
